comment: Melinda is incredibly kind and will do anything to help her students learn. She teaches in a way that helps students to know how to APPLY a concept (instead of only knowing the definition). I would definitely recommend her!

All you have to do in this class is discuss issues with the class, do a service project (could be small), a group project, and a reflection paper. It is all very easy and Mrs. Paige is one of the best teachers ever! Great facilitator and super nice! I HIGHLY recommend this class!!
